name: Mantle
description:
Delve deep through the dark corners of the soul, and descend into - the Mantle.



"What is this place?

What is wrong with me?

I might need help"



Mantle is an Emotional Platformer set beneath the crust of the Earth.
Falling deep into the pit of despair: Can you overcome this inner turmoil?

Make use of your Guiding Light , and traverse a variety of precarious subterranean environments.



Key Features
- This is a journey of self reflection and understanding
- Precise platforming will challenge your dexterity
- Soundtrack designed to soothe, immerse and uplift
